results.title: Euphronius painted: Krater of Heracles and Antaeus ...
results.creator_credit: Alain Jaubert, Pascal Vimenet, Delta Image, La Sept, FR3 and Musée du Louvre
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Palettes”.
The krater of Heracles and Antaeus describes a famous fight in Greek mythology. It is one of the most beautiful pieces in the Louvre Museum and is signed by Euphronius, a painter whose refined style can be found on numerous objects around 510 B.C. when a pictorial change came to pass. The program describes the krater in detail, explains Athenian ceramic techniques and something of the life of Euphronius.
results.title_for_label: Euphronius painted: Krater of Heracles and Antaeus …
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alain Jaubert, Pascal Vimenet, Delta Image, La Sept, FR3 and Musée du Louvre

results.title: Euphoria
results.brief_description: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.

constellations_other.name: If at first you don't succeed
constellations_other.description: Though originally intended as a laugh, Celeste Baber’s social media posts have become examples of body positivity to her eight million followers and challenge the absurd expectations put on women in society.

results.description: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.
description_for_label: A group of high school students navigate love and friendships in a world of drugs, sex, trauma, and social media.

results.title: Eumig Wien Type P8 Electrical Projector in box
results.brief_description:
Boxed Projector Eumig Wien Type P8 electrical projector Housed in Vinyl bound box. Green felt covered board/lid for inside box. This board has a leather tab which helps to lift the board up. The top metal handle on the projector can be clicked in to stay up, or it can be pushed down. The feet at the front are adjustable and allow for a tilting adjustment. Lens: Coated Eupro F1.6 25mm lens The machine must be opened to erect the spool arms. Brown power cord with a Eumig logo. Australian power plug (Ring grip, 10 AMP, 250 V, Made in Australia) English instruction manual enclosed. Eumig metal spool housed in original cardboard box. Made in Austria.

Reel capacity: 120m / 400ft diameter: 175mm diameter x 13mm depth Kelvin clear plastic spool. Made in Australia.

Reel capacity: 120m / 400ft diameter: 177mm diameter x 14mm depth yellow piece of card ribbon inside.

2 identical Philips projection lamps in their original boxes with double sided instructions. The lamp inside the box is packaged between two pieces of corrugated cardboard. 7238N / 05 12V 100W B15S A8 Made in Germany

Broken brush made from real hair. Made in Japan. (used for cleaning?)

results.title: Eumig Type P8 Automatic 'Novo' Standard-8 Projector
results.brief_description:
Eumig P8 M Standard-8 projector

From web:
Eumig P8 Automatic Novo
Standard 8mm
Lens: Eumig Eupro-Zoom 1:1,3 F 15-25
Eupronar1:1,4 F20
Lamp: 12V 100W, FCR
Film loading: Automatic threading
Reel capacity: 120m/400ft
Projection: Forward and backward
Projection speed: Variable Speed by Slider Control (8 - 24 fps)
Motor: DC Magnetic Motor
Power Source: AC. 50 Hz
Weight: 5600g
Dimensions: 130x240x210

results.title: EUMIG Mark 607D Dual 8 Silent Projector
results.brief_description:
“EUMIG Mark 607D Dual 8 Silent Projector Made in Austria 100/250V 50/60 Hz 145W Pr.Lampe Max 75W 12V serial number: 5274584 Housed in original cardboard box, foam inner in two pieces. Separate power cord with Australian plug. 1 empty reel Instruction manual Eumig guarantee certificate Peter Chews shop introduction card in a promotional bookmark format. Eumig service instructions Lamp Economy Switch print-out”

This projector is in a working condition, tested Feb 2020.
*Possibly purchased from Peter Chew’s shop, Singapore. Shop card found with warranty.
